abstract: In this week’s podcast: Andrea Electronics, Big Data and stylish hard drives.
snippet: In this week’s podcast: Andrea Electronics, Big Data and stylish hard drives.
lead_paragraph: Just what is “Big Data” and why is it such a big business? Quentin Hardy, a deputy technology editor at The Times, discusses his recent Bits blog post on the topic — and why it might be a good idea for future college students to consider a major in statistics.
